TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricKeyExchangeDeformatter

Docs.summary: Decrypts Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) key exchange data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Key exchange allows a sender to create secret information, for example, random data that can be used as a key in a symmetric encryption algorithm, and use encryption to send it to the intended recipient.
Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeFormatter> to create the key exchange message with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
> [!CAUTION] > It is highly recommended that you not attempt to create your own key exchange method from the basic functionality provided, because many details of the operation must be performed carefully in order for the key exchange to be successful.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter class to recreate an exchange key to be used to decrypt a message.
[!CODE [System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter2#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.cryptography.rsaoaepkeyexchangedeformatter2#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.SetKey%2A> to establish the key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm key) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> algorithm that holds the private key.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter"> class with the specified key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance unsigned int8[] DecryptKeyExchange(unsigned int8[] rgbData) cil managed

Docs.param: The key exchange data within which the secret information is hidden.
Docs.summary: Extracts secret information from the encrypted key exchange data.
Docs.returns: The secret information derived from the key exchange data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You must specify a key before calling this method.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the DecryptKeyExchange method to recreate an exchange key from a message sender. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1KeyExchangeDeformatter> class.
[!CODE [System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter2#3](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.cryptography.rsaoaepkeyexchangedeformatter2#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Parameters { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets the parameters for the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) key exchange.
Docs.value: An XML string containing the parameters of the OAEP key exchange operation.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to call the Parameters property to retrieve an XML representation of the parameters. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter> class.
[!CODE [System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter#12](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetKey(class System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm key) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> algorithm that holds the private key.
Docs.summary: Sets the private key to use for decrypting the secret information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAOAEPKeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.
